casebody.data:
DAVID P.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2016

Heather Clark, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Lisa A Riggione, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner David P.'s petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 455, 143 A.3d 1158 (2016), is denied.
